citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility has birds socially housed and also described different things they provide for the birds' environmental
enrichment, however a written plan of environmental enhancement hasn't been documented by the facility and approved
by the attending veterinarian. A species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement that is approved by the
attending veterinarian helps ensure that birds maintained at the facility receive appropriate enrichment and socialization.
Ensure to document and follow a plan that is approved by the attending veterinarian.
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class B license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspection(s) or by 7/19/2024 or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and
must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility has birds socially housed and also described different things they provide for the birds' environmental 
enrichment, however a written plan of environmental enhancement hasn't been documented by the facility and approved 
by the attending veterinarian. A species-appropriate plan for environmental enhancement that is approved by the 
attending veterinarian helps ensure that birds maintained at the facility receive appropriate enrichment and socialization. 
Ensure to document and follow a plan that is approved by the attending veterinarian. 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class B license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
All items must be in compliance within 2 more inspection(s) or by 7/19/2024 or the applicant will forfeit the license fee and 
must wait 6 months to reapply. Please contact your inspector to schedule your next Re-License Inspection. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.

species.common: BARBARY DOVE / RINGED TURTLE-DOVE / RINGNECK DOVE
